QuestData.Title: They Grow Up So Fast
QuestData.Description: I think this little fellow will be a good match for you.$B$BThis cub is going to require a lot of attention to ensure that he grows up strong and healthy. You should check up on your cub at least once each day. Feeding and caring for your Winterspring cub is the best way to build a bond of trust with him.$B$BAs your cub grows, he will shed his old whiskers and grow new ones appropriate to his size. Once your cub has shed twenty whiskers, bring him back to me along with some materials for your saddle.
QuestData.LogDescription: Accumulate 20 Winterspring Cub Whiskers shed by your Winterspring Cub. Bring the whiskers, 20 Runecloth, 20 Rugged Leather, and 80 gold to Rivern Frostwind.
